item.description:
Pre St. Patty's Day Afterwork Mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay district.

Afterwork mixer Thursday March 16th at Vox Populi 755 Boylston St. This venue has been an afterwork hotspot for Boston's professionals for quite some time, and what better way to get ready for the St. Patty's day festivities. So come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!

Meeting Details: This place gets packed on Thurs nites so we will meet on the 2nd floor near the bar. My picture is on the site so I should not be hard to find. If your picture is up on the site do RSVP and I will look for you as well. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.

See you there !

Steven

755 Boylston St. Boston Ma 02116

Public Transportation: Green Line to Copley or Hynes. Orange Line to Back Bay.

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Pre. St. Patty's Day Afterwork Mixer
